title: How to Buy a Gift Subscription on Netflix

steps.title: Open your Amazon account.
steps.content: Open your Amazon account. If you aren’t automatically logged in, type in your email and password and hit “Sign in.”

steps.title: Type “Netflix gift cards” into the search bar.
steps.content: Type “Netflix gift cards” into the search bar. The search bar is located at the top of the Amazon page.

steps.title: Click the magnifying glass to search.
steps.content: Click the magnifying glass to search.

steps.title: Click a gift card design.
steps.content: Click a gift card design. You can also click “See More” to view more creative designs that will go on the face of your gift card.

steps.title: Select your gift card amount.
steps.content: Select your gift card amount. The minimum is $25 while the maximum is $100.

steps.title: Type in your recipient's email.
steps.content: Type in your recipient's email. If you enter numerous emails, you can separate them using commas or by pressing Enter to write an email on a new line.

steps.title: Type a desired amount in the Quantity box.
steps.content: Type a desired amount in the Quantity box. If you want to buy more than one gift card, type a new number into the box. Otherwise, leave the default quantity at 1.

steps.title: Decide on a delivery date.
steps.content: Decide on a delivery date. You can type the delivery date into the text box beside the calendar icon using the MM/DD/YYYY format. You can also click the calendar icon to choose a specific date.

steps.title: Re-enter your password.
steps.content: Re-enter your password. Before you can checkout, you will be redirected to a security window.

steps.title: Enter your shipping address.
steps.content: Enter your shipping address. You can select from previous addresses on your Amazon account, or you can select an Amazon pickup address.

steps.title: Finalize your purchase.
steps.content: Finalize your purchase. Your gift card and a redemption code will be sent to your recipient's email. They can now use their gift card to create a Netflix account and start a new subscription.
